system.note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Eviscerator Chainsword of the Flesh Tearers Chapter. Two-Handed. +10 to all Willpower Test whilst wielded, or +20 if failing the test would lead to gaining Insanity Points.
